heading: Vessel of Hatred Tier Lists Updates!
content: Blizzard released the Patch 2.0.3 yesterday and already released the first 2.0.3 Patch Hotfix on October 17th. Today, the , always eager to provide you with the most accurate informations about Diablo 4, updated several Diablo 4 Tier Lists! Let's dive into it! Tier Lists are a great way to see how different builds and classes stack up against each other in various parts of the game. Today, we updated them with informations and findings from the first week of the Vessel of Hatred expansion! The Endgame Build Tier List is particularly good at finding a good build for all activities, including Nightmare Dungeons. The Bossing one is good for determining what builds will take you into the furthest depths of and get those coveted materials while the Speedfarming list is your go-to to know which build is farming content with the most efficiency! We hope you enjoy the Season of Hatred Rising and the Vessel of Hatred expansion with the aid of our Season 6 compendium update. Our focus for the start of Season 6 is to make sure our are solid with all the new Item updates, new features and mechanic changes while following vrious Vessel of Hatred hotfixes. We're continuing to work on more updates for With that said, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development and to make the most of your Season 6 and VoH experience! Also don't forget to check out our Written by:
